module.additional_description: Organize the display of products on homepage systematically You can select featured product tabs(popular, new arrivals, special, best sellers, recommended, trending and viewed products) or specific categories you want to display on website’s homepage. Awesome design and easy to use The design of Home Products PRO is clean, simple and appealing. Instead of navigating to individual product categories to find a product, your customers can browse through all products on your homepage using product carousel slider or product grid view. Load products instantly with jQuery Ajax & smart cache Products are loaded by jQuery Ajax & smart server caching technology to minimize time spent to load products (products are loaded on demand, only visible product tabs are load initially) and make your homepage faster.

module.name: cappasity3d
module.description: Showcase your product in 3D with the most powerful 3D platform on the market
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Showcase your product in 3D with the most powerful 3D platform on the market. Create your own 3D Views with the free Cappasity solution using just a regular camera and embed 3D views into your online store.
module.additional_description: Let your customers interact with your products in 3D exactly the same way as in the physical store. With 3D they can look at your product from all sides to see details and gain confidence in their purchase. Such immersive shopping experience is essential for e-commerce and results in higher conversion and lower returns. 3D Views are proven to increase engagement and conversion over static images by up to 30%! Cappasity solution is a powerful tool for capturing reflective or sparkling objects and demonstrating the textures of your products to potential customers.

module.name: todolist
module.displayName: To Do List (in your back office)
module.description: Acesse suas tarefas diretamente a partir do painel de controle de sua loja! Agora você não precisa mais usar diversos softwares: o módulo Lista de Afazeres está inclu&iacu
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Acesse suas tarefas diretamente a partir do painel de controle de sua loja! Agora você não precisa mais usar diversos softwares: o módulo Lista de Afazeres está incluído em seu back-office e lhe permite criar, editar, priorizar e classificar todas as suas tarefas para economizar tempo todos os dias!
module.additional_description: O módulo Lista de Afazeres da PrestaShop permite:Visualizar todas as ações a serem tomadas em sua loja diretamente a partir do seu painel de controle, sem precisar utilizar um outro aplicativoPriorizar suas tarefas em função do grau de urgência de cada ação a ser realizadaGanhar tempo e produtividade permitindo classificar as tarefas (pedidos em andamento, estoques a renovar, promoção a ser elaborada...),Criar tarefas em um único clique Acessar tudo que foi realizado visualizando as tarefas concluídas em uma outra abaAtribuir a realização de uma tarefa à pessoa que você desejar que tenha uma Conta de Funcionário no back-office de sua loja.

module.name: buylater
module.description: Um dos principais recursos dos grandes sites de e-commerce, acrescentar o "Buy Later” (salvar o produto para comprar mais tarde) no resumo do carrinho de compra é indispens&aacu
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Um dos principais recursos dos grandes sites de e-commerce, acrescentar o "Buy Later” (salvar o produto para comprar mais tarde) no resumo do carrinho de compra é indispensável para aumentar suas vendas e taxa de conversão.    Com apenas um clique (muito mais rápido do que uma lista de desejos), seus clientes podem colocar de lado os produtos selecionados e passar o pedido posteriormente.
module.additional_description: Aprimore a experiência do usuário oferecendo um recurso caro aos clientes dos maiores sites de e-commerce (Amazon, etc.) no resumo do carrinho; Aumente o carrinho médio dos clientes: eles esqueceram os produtos separados durante uma visita anterior, mas dessa vez irão colocá-los no carrinho mesmo sem essa intenção inicialmente; Melhore o resumo do carrinho de compra permitindo que os clientes listem seus produtos preferidos e os coloquem de lado; Impulsione suas vendas permitindo que encontrem esses itens em uma próxima visita e os coloquem novamente no carrinho; Retenha seus clientes permitindo que separem um produto que gostaram para a próxima compra; Estimule compras impulsivas indicando quando esses produtos estiverem em promoção ou o estoque estiver baixo.

module.name: topbanner
module.description: With the Top Banner module, increase the impact of your sales, special offers and generate more revenue by showing a sales incentive banner with a countdown on all of your site’s pages!   C
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: With the Top Banner module, increase the impact of your sales, special offers and generate more revenue by showing a sales incentive banner with a countdown on all of your site’s pages!   Communicate easily and effectively to all of your visitors throughout their purchase journey with a custom display and message for your banners.
module.additional_description: Highlight your sales codes and make your promotions, sales, and flash sales a successNearly 60% of internet users will abandon their purchase if they can’t find a sales code (Mailorama study). Thanks to your sales banner, your customers won't miss a sale, improving their overall buying experience.  Communicate with your visitors and customers easily and effectivelyThe banner is the ideal way of communicating with your users when launching a new collection, announcing a special offer, or during not-to-miss events (Christmas, Black Friday, etc.).  Boost your conversions and your earningsBy making sure that your message and inciting items (sales codes, timer, etc.) is shown on the banner that is always displayed on your site, your customers are encouraged to complete their purchases before the end of the sales offer.

module.name: seoimg
module.description: Apesar de as descrições das imagens serem um recurso de SEO pouco aplicado nas páginas de produto, uma descrição específica é um meio infal&iacute
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Apesar de as descrições das imagens serem um recurso de SEO pouco aplicado nas páginas de produto, uma descrição específica é um meio infalível de aumentar a visibilidade da sua loja virtual nos mecanismos de busca.   O módulo SEO Images (Tag Alt) automatiza a criação de tags Alt para imagens de produtos e fornece conteúdo de qualidade com o intuito de melhorar a posição da página do seu site.
module.additional_description: Ganhe tempo com o SEO e aproveite as vantagens do SEO das suas imagens com a escrita automática das tags Alt!   Por meio do módulo SEO Images (Tag Alt):Suba sua posição nos mecanismos de buscaAumente as vendas exponencialmente com uma melhor visibilidade das suas páginas de produtoAumente as taxas de conversão com tráfego ultraqualificadoDestaque-se da concorrência com regras diferenciadas para o SEO das suas imagens

module.name: amppages
module.displayName: PROFESSIONAL AMP PAGES - ACCELERATED MOBILE PAGES
module.description: The First AMP module built for PrestaShop is finally on Add-ons. Over 80 prebuilt features. 100% Template Independent - will work with any template used
module.author: Teapot Creative
module.description_full: The First AMP module built for PrestaShop is finally on Add-ons. Over 80 prebuilt features. 100% Template Independent - will work with any template used. 7X times faster Mobile Page based on Google's AMP project.
module.additional_description: ChangelogIf the AMP module works properly on your site, please do not update the module! - Bug fixing regarding the images load on the category page - We have implemented the possibility to add a link to the slider on the AMP pages.- Fixed the out of stock problem on the category pages.- The Custom text field on the home page is multilanguage ready from now. Benefits for Merchants You've always been wondering how to create efficient and straightforward mobile page. If you're checking this module, it means that you already know that more than 60% of your customers are coming from a Mobile device, the problem is always how to turn them to buyers or customers. Speed and functionality (simplicity is the key), have always been the two major factors when it comes to sales. We tend to overcomplicate things, and we forget that people checking stuff on mobile are time-dependent, they need the essentials, and motivation to make the purchase. What will this module offer you:  1. Seven times faster mobile page - no more VPS or Dedicated server is needed to have a quick Mobile version. Google caches the mobile result, and it's served to your customer at a ridiculous speed - It's almost Instant2.Boost your mobile results into the TOP placements in Google Mobile Search.3. Significantly higher conversion rate.4. We know that templates are always an issue, so we created one for you for free.5. We created 3 category and product page types, which allows you to conduct A/B tests based on Google Optimize.6. We have the most fantastic support out there, and we continuously develop our module. Our Goal is to offer you the most comprehensive AMP theme and Module out there.7.  Google Already announced that he's testing the AMP version on Tablets. Stay tuned to the new demands.8. Over 500 stores are using this module already

module.name: ets_megamenu
module.description: The most powerful Prestashop mega menu module 2019, awesome design, super easy-to-use, display perfectly on mobile devices, visual drag/drop backend, support both vertical & horizontal menu
module.author: ETS-Soft
module.description_full: The most powerful Prestashop mega menu module 2019, awesome design, super easy-to-use, display perfectly on mobile devices, visual drag/drop backend, support both vertical & horizontal menu. Mega Menu PRO is the best Prestashop menu module ever!
module.additional_description: 1. Awesome design We have optimized Mega Menu PRO with the best design options inclusive of prebuilt templates, submenu animations and custom color options for you to create an eye-catching mega menu for your website. Over 5 amazing pre-built templates are available to choose from in Mega Menu PRO module according to your preference. We have simplified template selection in Mega Menu PRO so that you can select a preferred template in a single click of your computer mouse. Mega Menu PRO comes with beautiful submenu appearance effects for the frontend such as “slide down”, “fade in” and “zoom in”, etc which can be selected to replace the default submenu appearance effect, giving your mega menu a lively touch. Unlimited color options are available for Mega Menu PRO including pre-made color sets. And in addition, we have facilitated custom color selection using the color picker to choose your own colors for the mega menu interface. 2. Support both vertical and horizontal Mega Menu PRO gives you capactiy of create any type of top menu for your website. With this mega menu module, you can create a vertical menu, a horizontal menu or combine the both types of menu into one menu. 3. Complete visual drag and drop backend To avoid reloading the website each time a change is applied in the backend, Mega Menu PRO has been built with 100% jQuery Ajax technology. The jQuery Ajax Technology we have incorporated is a unique feature only available in Mega Menu PRO which allows you to view changes you make in the backend, real-time on screen with no page reloading. Mega Menu PRO allows you to simply drag and drop elements to create whichever mega menu you like, making it not only a Prestashop megamenu module but also an idea creation tool. 4. Clean and professional mobile menu Mega Menu PRO can be used to build a responsive mega menu that can be displayed on devices of any screen size without trouble. Unlike many free Prestashop mega menu modules, Mega Menu PRO supports smooth mobile viewing and browsing with its mobile menu. We have built Mega Menu PRO as fully responsive Prestashop mega menu which displays nicely on mobile devices. 3 awesome mobile menu types are available that can be set according to your preference.- Side Menu – Floats from left to right or right to left- Bottom Menu – Appears below the main menu bar- Full Screen – Takes up the whole screen with a button to close the menu 5. Easily manageable backend Managing Mega Menu PRO does not require any advanced computer knowledge and can be done by anyone with basic computer knowledge due to the simplicity of its backend. Mega Menu PRO - Prestashop mega menu is smartly organized with 3 element types: menu, column, and block and it’s implemented based on bootstrap with 12 columns. Adding, deleting, editing, and duplicating items can be done easily. Easy drag and drop of items from sections are facilitated. 6. Easily customizable We have equipped Mega Menu PRO with different customization methods to give your website mega menus a unique touch according to your requirements. Multi-content types: Mega Menu PRO allows you to use different content types inside your top menu (text, images, categories selection, manufacturer selection, custom HTML, videos, maps, products...) Automatically select and display featured products in your menu: you can add new/popular/special/best sellers products block in any column. In addition, you can also choose specific items by their ID to display in top menu. Extra features: display shopping cart, search box, user info links or custom HTML text in top menu. Google fonts: Mega Menu PRO supports 500+ Google fonts. A preferred font can be selected from a drop-down selection and the font will be immediately applied to your website menu on the frontend. Custom CSS supported: Add your own CSS via backend with color shortcodes for the mega menu. Custom Class: Add custom CSS classes to any element. 7. Import/Export Mega Menu PRO allows you to import/export your entire mega menu content in one click. This is an advanced, unique feature in Mega Menu PRO which is not available in any other free Prestashop Mega Menu module, which helps you to easily backup or transfer menu content when required. 8. Multi-language and RTL support As we developed Mega Menu PRO with the intention of becoming the most popular Prestashop menu module in the world of Prestashop e-commerce software, it is built to work perfectly with and support multi-languages including RTL languages (Arabic, Hebrew…). 9. Loading speed Mega Menu PRO has its own smart cache which makes entire menu content to be loaded instantly even when your menu has a complex structure with many menu items. 10. Many more other awesome features This Prestashop mega menu module - Mega Menu PRO comes with many more awesome features which include tab/list modes, custom hook, sticky menu, bubble colorful alert text, reset default, etc. It also allows you to include your website shopping cart, search module, user-info link block and custom HTML into the menu bar.

module.name: psproductstats
module.displayName: Estatísticas avançadas de produto (Analytics e dicas)
module.description: Em um piscar de olhos e de cada ficha de produto, tenha acesso a todas as estatísticas mais importantes e tire proveito de ideias de marketing e conselhos de otimização para aumen
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Em um piscar de olhos e de cada ficha de produto, tenha acesso a todas as estatísticas mais importantes e tire proveito de ideias de marketing e conselhos de otimização para aumentar o desempenho de cada produto e impulsionar suas vendas!
module.additional_description: Com o módulo Estatísticas de Produtos e Conselhos, desenvolvido pela PrestaShop, encontre para cada item e no período desejado:   As informações sobre as vendas e a renda gerada:A curva das vendas realizadas;O faturamento bruto;O faturamento líquido;O perfil dos consumidores por:Sexo;Idade;País;Preferências de pagamento;Preferências de entrega.  A comparação do desempenho desse produto com os outros itens da mesma categoria no período selecionado, em termos de:Quantidade de vendas;Faturamento;Taxa de conversão;Abandono de carrinhos;Taxa de reembolso.

module.name: pshomeslider
module.description: Graças ao módulo Homepage Slider, comunique-se com eficiência com os seus visitantes exibindo um slider de tela cheia e responsivo em sua página inicial!   Com este sli
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Graças ao módulo Homepage Slider, comunique-se com eficiência com os seus visitantes exibindo um slider de tela cheia e responsivo em sua página inicial!   Com este slider personalizável em alguns minutos, modernize a exibição de sua página inicial e atraia imediatamente a atenção de seus visitantes desde sua chegada à loja!
module.additional_description: Modernize e enriqueça sua página inicial mantendo um design simples apresentando todo o seu conteúdo importante em um controle deslizante no formato e estilo que você escolher. Destaque suas informações desejadas e tenha sucesso em suas campanhas de comunicação. Quer você esteja lançando novos produtos, promovendo ou anunciando eventos futuros, o controle deslizante permite garantir a máxima visibilidade da sua mensagem na página inicial da sua loja e incentivar os visitantes a conhecer seu conteúdo.

module.name: pspixel
module.description: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop!
module.additional_description: Use the Facebook pixel with your Prestashop website to:   -          Measure the results of your ads: Understand sales that resulted from your Facebook campaigns using Facebook ads reporting. -          Reach the right people: Find new customers and optimize your ads for people who are more likely to make a purchase by creating custom audiences. -          Show the right products: Automatically create ads that showcase your products, or use dynamic ads to retarget your site visitors with relevant ads based on what they browsed on your website -           Export your catalog on the Facebook Business Manager platform with data about each product

module.name: bmsprocurement
module.categoryName: Conexão com software de terceiros (CRM, ERP...)
module.description: Procurement is a PrestaShop ERP's module providing the features to run your supply orders such as suppliers management, supply orders creation and tracking, calculation of the stock needs
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Procurement is a PrestaShop ERP's module providing the features to run your supply orders such as suppliers management, supply orders creation and tracking, calculation of the stock needs.
module.additional_description: Take advantage of Procurement to optimize your stock by preventing your need and running your supply purchases and your suppliers.  PrestaShop ERP's Procurement allows you to:Prevent out-of-stock productsBe aware of your stock levelsManage product quantities and purchase priceRun your suppliersCreate and track supply ordersReceive supply orders

module.name: psgiftcards
module.description: Dobre o número de clientes e aumente seu prestígio sem esforço com os vales presente! Permita a seus clientes dar o presente perfeito graças ao módulo Vale Presente
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Dobre o número de clientes e aumente seu prestígio sem esforço com os vales presente! Permita a seus clientes dar o presente perfeito graças ao módulo Vale Presente Premium, desenvolvido para você pela PrestaShop. Práticos e simples, os vales presente são os preferidos pelos consumidores, porque agradam sempre e dão aos beneficiários a liberdade de escolher na sua loja os produtos que quiserem!
module.additional_description: Uma venda = 2 clientes! Aquele que compra o Vale Presente e aquele que o ganha. Com esse módulo, proponha vales presente do valor de sua escolha que seus clientes poderão comprar e dar de presente aos familiares e amigos deles, que os usarão na sua loja. Este presente ideal é adequado para todos os ramos de atividade (moda, alta tecnologia, beleza, esporte, viagem, etc.) e atende a todas as expectativas, qualquer que seja a data a comemorar. O Vale Presente Premium permite:Conseguir novos clientes por um custo muito baixo: os beneficiários de vales presente representam um mercado com inúmeros novos clientes em potencial que poderão se transformar em usuários fiéis; Aumentar suas vendas: o vale presente é uma fonte indispensável de faturamento adicional porque os beneficiários acabam gastando frequentemente mais do que o valor do vale; Cuidar da imagem de sua loja: ao criar um relacionamento de ganho mútuo com seus usuários, você aumenta a satisfação de seus clientes e se diferencia de seus concorrentes; Incentivar os clientes indecisos a comprar: ao oferecer um presente sem riscos e adaptado a todos os segmentos, você atende às necessidades de todos seus clientes, até mesmo os mais indecisos.

module.name: alcarecategorize
module.displayName: Copy & Move Products Between Categories - Dropshipping
module.description: With this module, you move or copy products massively between categories. Especially useful for DROPSHIPPING and to synchronize products with your ERP
module.author: Alcalink
module.description_full: With this module, you move or copy products massively between categories. Especially useful for DROPSHIPPING and to synchronize products with your ERP. It allows cleaning categories and moving both entire categories and specific products.
module.additional_description: Streamline the movement of your products, you will have the store fully organized quickly, easily and efficiently. The most useful module for Dropshipping and for synchronization with an ERP, since you can move / copy products by hand, but also by means of a PROGRAMMED TASK. MOVE / COPY / CLEAN COMPLETE CATEGORIES You can move complete categories only by choosing the source category and the destination category. In this way, the products will no longer appear in the source category, to appear in the destination category. You also have the option to copy one category into another. The products of the source category will also appear in the destination category, so your products will have more visibility and increase the sales of your store. If necessary, you can also clean an entire category, so the products in that category will belong to the start category of your Prestashop. MOVE / COPY SPECIFIC PRODUCTS If you are interested in not moving the entire category, if you only want to move certain products you can also do it very easily. You can search through a filter the category you want and select the products you want to move or copy. In the same way, if you move them they will appear in the destination category, while if the copies will appear in the destination category, as well as in the origin. SEARCH FILTER To facilitate the selection of categories, a filter with text has been enabled to avoid wasting time in tedious infinite deployments. You can search for the desired category and select it instantly. SCHEDULED TASK If you do not have much time to make the changes there is no problem, for this we have the option to do it through a scheduled task that you will add in your Hosting and that will make the changes you want automatically. An organized store will automatically transform into an increase in sales. Available in several different languages, such as Spanish, English, Italian or French. In a few minutes you will have learned to make use of our module, since you have at your disposal a documentation explaining step by step installation, configuration and operation.

module.name: alcaclickandcall
module.description: Com Botão de chamada antenha seus clientes a apenas um clique de distância
module.author: Alcalink
module.description_full: Com Botão de chamada antenha seus clientes a apenas um clique de distância. Receba chamadas de seus clientes do seu Prestashop usando um botão que aparecerá na versão móvel e que será totalmente configurável para adaptá-lo ao estilo de sua loja.
module.additional_description: Para melhorar a taxa de conversão da sua loja, use Botão da chamada. A solução mais rápida e mais direta, com a qual você permitirá que seus clientes entrem em contato com você em caso de dúvidas em questão de segundos. Evite que os clientes duvidosos acabem descartando a compra de seus produtos. Com este módulo, seus clientes estarão a apenas um clique de você. A comunicação com seus clientes será instantânea e muito intuitiva, qualquer usuário pode usar o botão de chamada sem qualquer problema. Faça com que os visitantes da sua loja acabem sendo clientes. A melhoria do atendimento ao cliente se tornará um número maior de vendas e fará com que os clientes comprem novamente em sua loja. A sua imagem como vendedor irá melhorar substancialmente de uma forma muito simples. Controle a atividade de seus clientes por meio do Google Analytics. Com Botão de chamada, você pode criar um evento do Google Analytics com o qual você pode acompanhar os movimentos feitos pelos usuários em sua loja. Não se preocupe com o estilo da sua loja. Você pode configurar absolutamente todos os valores do botão, para que ele se adapte ao design da sua loja e acabe sendo um elemento decorativo dentro dele. O botão de chamada também é multi-idioma e pode ser usado em vários idiomas diferentes, como espanhol, inglês, italiano, francês, português, holandês ou alemão. Em poucos minutos você terá aprendido a utilizar nosso módulo, já que você tem à sua disposição uma documentação explicando passo a passo a instalação, configuração e operação.

module.name: totcustomfields
module.displayName: Advanced Custom Fields : create new fields quickly
module.description: This module allows you to create your custom fields and to show them on Product, Category or Order pages in Back Office and Front Office
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: This module allows you to create your custom fields and to show them on Product, Category or Order pages in Back Office and Front Office. 4 types of fields are available : text, text area, image, video.
module.additional_description: Accelerate your web site development: no need to write dozens of lines of code for adding a custom field in PrestaShop. Create your new custom fields for a few minutes and display them on your product, category or order pages.The module configuration is simple: whether you are a beginner or an expert, this module has been developed to meet a multiple uses. The configuration of the module is simple for people without programming languages knowledge.  How does it work?create a new field via module configurations;fill this field via Product, Category or Order pages (depending on your custom field location) in Back Office;show the corresponding value in the Front Office. and that is not all! 3 locations are available : Product, Category or Order page (more than 10 native hooks and specific shortcodes for every field for "smarty" display);every field that you create can be required or optional;add instructions for showing your colleagues more information about new fields;you can choose one of 4 types of fields: - text: simple text or phone number, - text area: text only, HTML allowed, WYSIWYG editor, - image: you can upload different format of images : .png, .jpeg, gif. For showing it in the Front Office you can indicate a custom size or use recommended by Prestashop dimensions (for example: large_default (800x800 px) or category_default (141x180 px) etc), - video: integrate video from YouTube;if you want to show the same value you can indicate a default value: it fills automatically every field in Back Office. The default value will be shown on every page in the Front Office;every field could be translatable;you can not only create but also edit, disable or delete created custom fields;view the summary by product, category and order pages : the list of already filled fields is available via Back Office menu: you can access directly to the corresponding page for changing value.

module.name: bmsorderpreparation
module.description: Order Preparation is a PrestaShop ERP’s module made in partnership with Boost my Shop
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Order Preparation is a PrestaShop ERP’s module made in partnership with Boost my Shop. It provides advanced features to fulfill orders by picking, packing and shipping the sold items using a barcode scanner and a picking list.
module.additional_description: The order picking tool will allow you to significantly optimize the shipping time while reducing the risk of error (sending unpaid order, wrong product ...).

module.name: wkdropshipping
module.description: This Extension helps admin import products and their combinations from AliExpress to his prestashop store and admin can sell them without stocking the inventory
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: This Extension helps admin import products and their combinations from AliExpress to his prestashop store and admin can sell them without stocking the inventory.Order placed on Prestashop can be placed on Aliexpress on a single click.
module.additional_description: Drop shipping is an ecommerce business model that allows you to sell products from your store without investing capital in inventory.With drop shipping, store owners can sell products to their customers without actually stocking the items themselves. Small and Medium scale ecommerce entrepreneurs love dropshipping because there is no inventory to hold, which gives admin an advantage of lower investment. The biggest difference between dropshipping and the standard retail model is that the selling merchant doesn’t stock or own inventory. Instead, the merchant purchases inventory as needed from a third party to fulfill orders. With our Prestashop Aliexpress Dropshipping Module, The admin can import products and their combinations from AliExpress into his prestashop store and can start selling those products within his own store very easily without having to stock the products physically. Once the Order has been placed on Prestashop, Awesome Order Automation process helps you to place order on Aliexpress on a single click ! This is done by a custom built Chrome extension that can be downloaded from here - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/prestashop-aliexpress-imp/iochebggflimfedlldfjjomnkpoikknk?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog

module.name: productwarrantypro
module.description: This module allows the customer to see if a purchased product has a valid warranty. The product warranty is automatically generated when an order takes place
module.author: ProQuality
module.description_full: This module allows the customer to see if a purchased product has a valid warranty. The product warranty is automatically generated when an order takes place. The customer may send a service request of the purchased product.
module.additional_description: The merchant can check the serial number of the product and complete the service or send the request to the provider.You can exchange messages with the customer related to a warranty. Keep tracking of the warranties, add service revisions on them, send warranty as attachment. Managing warranty by adding a couple of statuses.

module.name: pswebnotification
module.description: Deixe os e-mails e adote uma solução mais eficaz enviando aos visitantes notificações push pelo seu site! Seja para uma promoção especial ou o lançam
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Deixe os e-mails e adote uma solução mais eficaz enviando aos visitantes notificações push pelo seu site! Seja para uma promoção especial ou o lançamento de uma nova coleção, opte por uma das tecnologias mais inovadoras do momento e envie mensagens personalizadas no navegador dos clientes, para chamar atenção e fazer com que voltem à sua loja!
module.additional_description: O que é uma notificação push? Essas notificações são mensagens nas quais podemos clicar, enviadas por um site aos navegadores dos usuários cadastrados. Eles recebem as notificações mesmo que o site não esteja aberto no navegador.   Aumente a taxa de cadastro (opt-in) dos clientes Os internautas têm sido cada vez mais prudentes ao transmitir informações pessoais on-line. Faça com que possam acompanhar suas notícias sem precisar inserir dados!   Garanta uma taxa de envio de 100% para suas mensagens Ao contrário dos e-mails, as notificações push não são impactadas pelos adblockers e filtros de spam. A mensagem chega diretamente aos clientes cadastrados, e você aumenta a eficácia das suas campanhas de comunicação.   Impulsione a taxa de conversão da sua loja 5 vezes mais eficaz do que o e-mail marketing, com uma taxa de leitura entre 80% e 90%, essa nova tecnologia na moda tem mostrado resultados surpreendentes. Com um conteúdo simplificado e interessante, os clientes podem visualizar suas mensagens em um piscar de olhos, assegurando um aumento na taxa de reatividade e na conversão.

module.name: psagechecker
module.description: Tome as precauções legais para a venda de álcool, tabaco e outros, verificando a idade de seus visitantes com o auxílio de uma janela popup assim que chegarem em sua loja
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Tome as precauções legais para a venda de álcool, tabaco e outros, verificando a idade de seus visitantes com o auxílio de uma janela popup assim que chegarem em sua loja.   Os varejistas de certas categorias de produtos são responsáveis por verificar a idade de seus clientes antes de confirmar um pedido. Este módulo é ideal para ajudá-lo a tomar essas precauções automaticamente no início de sua navegação e evitar a venda de certos produtos sujeitos a restrições legais.
module.additional_description: Para lojas de álcool, tabaco ou outro produto para adultos Este módulo impede que menores de idade tenham acesso à sua loja graças a uma janela popup que solicita que você preencha sua idade ou data de nascimento, e o visitante, tendo indicado ter a idade necessária para navegação, poderá explorar sua loja, de acordo com a lei.

module.name: shoptermsit
module.displayName: Custom Terms and Conditions for Italy - GDPR Compliant Module
module.description: Protect yourself against any dispute with Custom terms and conditions adapted to your activity and GDPR compliant ! Customize and update the B to C Custom Terms and Conditions of your onlin
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect yourself against any dispute with Custom terms and conditions adapted to your activity and GDPR compliant ! Customize and update the B to C Custom Terms and Conditions of your online store using the template created by a law firm specializing in Internet law in collaboration with PrestaShop and protect yourself against any dispute! This module takes the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) into account. This module is available for merchants subject to VAT located in Italy ONLY.
module.additional_description: Right to data portability, right to access or right to obtain erasure of the personal data, …  All of these subjects are now enforced by the european regulation (General Data Protection Regulation). Starting from the 25th of may 2018 and the entry in force of the GDPR, every e-merchant have to update the Terms and Conditions of his shop to include news specificities for personal data protection of his clients. Your PrestaShop Custom Terms and Conditions allow you to alleviate customer disputes and to comply with the recommendations of the DGCCRF and the CNIL, which ensures you a serene operation of your online store while strengthening the confidence of your customers. This offer includes a 15-page guide including:The Custom terms and conditions for online marketing to be adapted according to your activity with the recommendations made by a specialized law firmA template of mandatory "terms and conditions" in HTML and PDF format to be inserted directly on your website.

module.name: pssitemap
module.displayName: Gerador de Mapa do Site para SEO (XML & HTML)
module.description: Otimize a busca orgânica (SEO) de sua loja em todos os motores de pesquisa gerando automaticamente, em apenas um clique, os mapas dos sites de sua loja!   Aumente sem esforço o tr&aa
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Otimize a busca orgânica (SEO) de sua loja em todos os motores de pesquisa gerando automaticamente, em apenas um clique, os mapas dos sites de sua loja!   Aumente sem esforço o tráfego em sua loja on-line: em alguns cliques, você transmite aos motores de pesquisa a estrutura de seu site e todas as páginas que eles devem indexar!
module.additional_description: O que é um sitemap? Um sitemap (mapa do site) é um arquivo XML ou HTML que apresenta a arquitetura geral de sua loja priorizando recursos e conteúdos.   Facilite o acesso de sua loja aos web crawlers e, consequentemente, aos seus clientes! Os sitemaps XML permitem indicar aos web crawlers dos motores de pesquisa uma lista de todas as páginas de sua loja a serem percorridas e indexadas, bem como informações sobre a natureza desses elementos e eventualmente sobre a maneira de indexá-los.   Isto tem a vantagem de aumentar a busca orgânica de sua loja nos resultados de pesquisa.   Os sitemaps HTML fornecem uma navegação mais simples em sua loja, além de melhor experiência de compra para os clientes e, portanto, uma taxa de rejeição menor.   Automatize a criação de sitemaps! Além de tudo, este módulo permite automatizar a geração de seus sitemaps e a busca orgânica de seus novos produtos graças às tarefas agendadas!

module.name: shoptermsuk
module.displayName: Custom Terms and Conditions for United Kingdom- GDPR Compliant Module
module.description: Protect yourself against any dispute with Custom terms and conditions adapted to your activity and GDPR compliant ! Customize and update the B to C Custom Terms and Conditions of your onlin
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect yourself against any dispute with Custom terms and conditions adapted to your activity and GDPR compliant ! Customize and update the B to C Custom Terms and Conditions of your online store using the template created by a law firm specializing in Internet law in collaboration with PrestaShop and protect yourself against any dispute! This module takes the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) into account. This module is available for merchants subject to VAT located in the United Kingdom ONLY.
module.additional_description: Right to data portability, right to access or right to obtain erasure of the personal data, …  All of these subjects are now enforced by the european regulation (General Data Protection Regulation). Starting from the 25th of may 2018 and the entry in force of the GDPR, every e-merchant have to update the Terms and Conditions of his shop to include news specificities for personal data protection of his clients. Your PrestaShop Custom Terms and Conditions allow you to alleviate customer disputes and to comply with the recommendations of the DGCCRF and the CNIL, which ensures you a serene operation of your online store while strengthening the confidence of your customers. This offer includes a 15-page guide including:The Custom terms and conditions for online marketing to be adapted according to your activity with the recommendations made by a specialized law firmA template of mandatory "terms and conditions" in HTML and PDF format to be inserted directly on your website.

module.name: advancedstock
module.description: Advanced Stock is a PrestaShop ERP's module providing the features to manage your stocks in different warehouses, edit stock levels using a barcode scanner or register stock movements in your back
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Advanced Stock is a PrestaShop ERP's module providing the features to manage your stocks in different warehouses, edit stock levels using a barcode scanner or register stock movements in your back office.
module.additional_description: Gain in productivity and save time in your stock management by managing stock movements and changes and the activity list of these. PrestaShop ERP's Advanced Stock allows you to:Register stock movements from a warehouse to another oneSet attributes for each one of your warehouses : name, address, opening hours, status,...Keep an activity list of movements Be aware of your stock levels

module.name: psbuybutton
module.description: Venda seus produtos a partir de artigos de blog ou de sites externos adicionando a eles Call to Action e Buy Button
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Venda seus produtos a partir de artigos de blog ou de sites externos adicionando a eles Call to Action e Buy Button.   Seus visitantes acessarão com um só clique o carrinho de compra diretamente da menção do seu produto em um blog ou outro site externo.   Graças ao módulo Buy Button, aumente o tráfego e a taxa de conversão sempre mantendo sua identidade visual!
module.additional_description: Melhore o conteúdo das suas páginas externas, CMS, blog ao destacar os produtos mencionados.Aumente o tráfego na sua loja ao redirecionar os visitantes provenientes de sites externos ou de campanhas de e-mail.Aumente sua taxa de conversão ao reduzir o tempo e o número de etapas em seu funil de compras.

module.name: pscustomblock
module.displayName: Bloco de imagem personalizada na página inicial
module.description: Otimize o design e a exibição da sua página inicial ao incluir blocos de imagem e blocos de texto facilmente personalizáveis em alguns cliques!   Com a ajuda do m&oacu
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Otimize o design e a exibição da sua página inicial ao incluir blocos de imagem e blocos de texto facilmente personalizáveis em alguns cliques!   Com a ajuda do módulo Bloc Custom Homepage, deixe a página mais atrativa e eficaz, mantendo sua identidade visual de marca e cativando seus visitantes desde a chegada deles à sua loja on-line!
module.additional_description: Chamar a atenção dos visitantes desde a chegada deles à sua loja. Os internautas demoram em média três segundos para decidir se continuam em um site da internet e oito segundos para efetuar uma ação. Ofereça aos novos visitantes a melhor impressão possível e reduza a taxa de rejeição do seu site! Aprimore sua página inicial e valorize as especificidades da sua loja. A página inicial, vitrine da sua loja on-line, deve destacar as vantagens que lhe possibilitam se diferenciar da concorrência. Com nosso módulo Bloc Custom Homepage, mostre as informações essenciais que você deseja destacar nos blocos de imagens e nos blocos de texto, mantendo um design simples e elegante. Cative seus possíveis clientes e aumente sua taxa de conversão. Segundo um estudo de Stanford, 75% dos internautas admitem que julgam a credibilidade de uma empresa com base no design do site na Web. Com uma aparência profissional do seu site, fortaleça a confiança entre sua empresa e os consumidores e os incentive a descobrir seu conteúdo, fazer uma compra ou entrar em contato com você.

module.name: psmassedit
module.description: Ganhe em produtividade durante a edição de produtos
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Ganhe em produtividade durante a edição de produtos. Seja o preço, a quantidade em estoque ou sua categoria, efetue essas operações em massa em poucos cliques ou as programe.   Com a ajuda dos filtros pertinentes e de um campo de pesquisa, selecione rapidamente os produtos a editar e aplique uma redução de -20% de seu preço, um aumento de +15€, inclua 100 artigos no estoque ou adicione uma nova categoria em massa a esta seleção, por exemplo. Essas operações podem ser programadas ou revertidas a qualquer momento.
module.additional_description: Filtre os produtos a editar de acordo com o nome, ID, preço, referência, categoria, fornecedor ou quantidade em estoque, conforme a correspondência exata do termo, a ocorrência ou uma página de pesquisa. Selecione os produtos do catálogo a editar e aplique uma operação em massa em três cliques. Utilize o painel para acompanhar as edições para apagar, cancelar ou restabelecer uma operação.

module.name: spmgsnipreview
module.displayName: Product, Shop Reviews, Reminder, Profile, Rich Snippets
module.description: Best "Conversion rates" module on prestashop awards 2019! Increase conversion, traffic, visibility in the Google search results: Highly flexible module
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Best "Conversion rates" module on prestashop awards 2019! Increase conversion, traffic, visibility in the Google search results: Highly flexible module. Also, it's not all, module include Google Product Review Feeds for Google Shopping.
module.additional_description: Increase conversion, traffic, visibility in the Google search results: Highly flexible module Product, Shop Reviews, Reminder, Profile, Rich Snippets. Also, it's not all, module include Google Product Review Feeds for Google Shopping. Read below about all available functions General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - Compliant with PrestaShop’s Official GDPR Compliance Module

module.name: pscartdropdown
module.description: O módulo Carrinho suspenso permite a configuração de um carrinho suspenso para otimizar a experiência do usuário dos seus clientes e os incentivar a finalizar o pedid
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: O módulo Carrinho suspenso permite a configuração de um carrinho suspenso para otimizar a experiência do usuário dos seus clientes e os incentivar a finalizar o pedido.   O resumo do carrinho é mostrado ao passar o mouse e permite redirecionar seus clientes diretamente para a primeira etapa do funil de compras para uma melhor taxa de conversão.
module.additional_description: Aumentar sua taxa de conversão:Segundo a Sale Cycle, 74% dos visitantes do seu site vão abandonar o carrinho sem apertar o botão de fazer o pedido. Facilite o acesso deles a este botão ao mostrar o botão Fazer pedido em seu menu suspenso para que eles possam finalizar o pedido com mais rapidez.  Vinte e três por cento dos compradores abandonam o carrinho somente porque não têm uma ideia precisa do valor total do pedido durante as compras. Com nosso módulo de Carrinho suspenso, seu cliente pode consultar o progresso do carrinho e seu preço quando quiser, não importando em que página está durante a navegação.  Ofereça melhor experiência do cliente:Poder consultar o resumo no carrinho a partir de qualquer página sem sair da navegação dá tranquilidade aos clientes. Este carrinho suspenso foi estudado para reagir aos movimentos do mouse dos clientes, para evitar frustrações.

module.name: psrecaptcha
module.description: Com a ajuda do módulo reCaptcha - Google anti Spam, evite spams e robôs e proteja as criações de conta e as mensagens de contato com uma tecnologia de reconhecimento de comp
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Com a ajuda do módulo reCaptcha - Google anti Spam, evite spams e robôs e proteja as criações de conta e as mensagens de contato com uma tecnologia de reconhecimento de comportamento humano. Please note that the ReCaptcha module is not compatible with the "one page checkout" option on PrestaShop 1.6. However, your ReCaptcha will be visible on the "one page checkout" on PrestaShop 1.7.
module.additional_description: O reCaptcha é um sistema que utiliza as capacidades de reconhecimento dos usuários humanos com testes CAPTCHA (Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computer and Humans Apart)Bloqueie o acesso à sua loja a robôs e a spams para criação da conta, conexão a uma conta e envio de mensagens de contato.

module.name: ets_superspeed
module.displayName: Super Speed - Incredibly fast - GTmetrix optimization
module.description: All-in-one speed optimization tool to maximize page speed, utilize server resources and improve SEO
module.author: ETS-Soft
module.description_full: All-in-one speed optimization tool to maximize page speed, utilize server resources and improve SEO. Innovative caching solutions, image and database optimization, HTML/ CSS/JavaScript minification and GZIP are all included for website instant load
module.additional_description: There is a fact that online stores with a hyper loading speed make more money. Your potential customers can truly get disappointed if they have to wait more than 4 seconds for your web page to fully display. And we're not done yet! Slow page speed will terribly affect SEO ranking of your website on search engines such as Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc. This reduces the visibility of your website to potential customers thus negatively affects your brand’s reputation and revenue. Prestashop does provide cache optimization settings, but it's not sufficient and quite complicated for new Prestashop users. That’s why we make Super Speed, an All-in-one Prestashop speed optimization tool. This module not only brings to your website innovative speed optimization solutions lacking in Prestashop by default (page cache, image optimization, database optimization, etc.), it also helps simplify the default speed optimization process of Prestashop. Super Speed guarantees to make your website faster than ever in just one click of your computer mouse! Below are the optimization technologies used in Super Speed: 1. Innovative Prestashop cache solutions Page cache Page cache helps improve your website speed considerably by storing all static contents into HTML files. The HTML files will be displayed instantly to website visitors every time they query a page. Server cache and Smarty cache Server cache helps reduce the stress on your server by saving certain data in cache files such as database query results, arithmetic calculation results, etc. to reuse in later processes. Otherwhile, Smarty cache stores a copy of the template files rendered in Smarty compilation process and reuse them in next times the templates are requested to reduce template rendering time. Server cache and Smarty cache work together will greatly improve the performance of your website as well as make it much faster. Browser cache Browser cache stores several resources locally on visitor’s web browser (images, icons, web fonts, etc.) so when someone visits the same page for a second time, the browser displays the page in no time without having to connect to remote server to get necessary resources. Thanks to speed-enhancing feature, this module can be an excellent SEO optimization tool for your online store. Google appreciates quality and high loading speed websites, and your website will be more likely to appear at the top of the search result page. 2. Comprehensive Prestashop image optimization tool Super Speed comeswith an advanced image optimization tool including 3 optimization methods: reSmush, TinyPNG and PHP optimization script. It allows you to optimize all common images available on your website and helps reduce the image sizes significantly. In addition, this module provides Lazy loading feature to defer loading of images at page load time. Therefore, the images can be loaded faster to visitor and save lots of your hosting storage. 3. Database optimization Prestashop database optimization feature allows you to clean unnecessary data in database such as connection logs, useless discount codes, abandoned carts, etc. (those data are only used for statistics purpose and can be cleaned if not necessary for you). The clearance helps save database space and reduce database access time. 4. HTML, JavaScript and CSS minification This speed optimization module for Prestashop also helps minify HTML, JavaScript and CSS code of your Prestashop website by removing repeated line breaks, white spaces, tabs and other unnecessary characters. Once the minification is enabled, it will help reduce the size of HTML, JavaScript and CSS files loading to visitor significantly and boost your page loading speed. 5. GZIP compression GZIP is a must-have feature for all websites nowadays. GZIP is included in Super Speed and can be enabled easily in 1 click. With GZIP compression, you can reduce the size of data loaded to visitor and save your website’s bandwidth by up to 70% without sacrificing the quality of images or other graphics. 6. System analytics Super Speed offers a system analytic tool to help you keep track of installed modules' performance and provides useful recommendations to further optimize your website's speed.

module.name: tathanksshopping
module.displayName: Thanks Shopping : A THANKS that prints the difference $
module.description: For each order, with one 1-click print a nice personalized thank you note accompanied by a unique discount coupon to encourage them to purchase again
module.author: TimActive
module.description_full: For each order, with one 1-click print a nice personalized thank you note accompanied by a unique discount coupon to encourage them to purchase again.1st automatic and easy-to-use solution to develop your business image and increase sales.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales, retain and CAPITALIZE your customers! Now with Thanks Shopping attaching a nice personalized thank you note after the purchase is super easy. Plus the choice to accompany it with a unique discount coupon and… the icing on the cake, everything is automatic, a dream!!!! do you want to know more ??? + FINALLY CAPITALIZE YOUR CUSTOMERS + The module will be INDISPENSABLE when you sell on the Marketplaces and you don’t have e-mails. Simply slip your personalized Thanks in your parcels or send it by post. + BOOST YOUR SALES + With Thanks Shopping, nothing more simple and fun to multiply your turnover. Boost your sales by encouraging a new purchase Depending on your setting, your thank you note may be accompanied by a unique discount coupon that is also automatically generated. All the discount possibilities provided by PrestaShop for the coupons are included (percentage reduction, amount, offer a gift). Boost your sales by facilitating the purchase process. Yes, the thank you note can include a QRCode to automate the process: Automatic identification, automatic coupon addition... Did you know? Since 2017 smart-phones can scan the QRCode from the camera; no need for any additional apps. As mobile-tech is moving towards QRCode standards, we are at the forefront. + TEMPLATE EDITOR THAT WILL SHOW YOUR CREATIVITY + Without any technical knowledge, an innovative module integrating a fully equipped template editor that will simplify your creations, but also!! Insert your text... your logo... images… and more, even QR Codes by simply dragging and dropping. Easy at that.. And that's not all, thanks to its powerful variable system and translation features we will make your message personal. Not to mention the ability to download your own fonts and images to create your most beautiful templates all in one snap. + TEMPLATES OFFERED + Out of inspiration, our designers have thought of you! A decent collection of templates, all ready to use, are included in the module. Import, and Edit at your convenience, it’s a breeze to use... +A THANK YOU ADAPTED TO EACH OF YOUR CUSTOMER + It’s all possible thanks to our scenario based approach, the module always allows you to generate the right note to the right customer by making your own criteria based logic according to: Customer information (country, age, civility, group...). The order content (amount, product, products category). Season (Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day ...). Showcase your creativity with the advanced tools available to you, here are some examples: Scenario 1: For New Customers (order Generate a personalized thank you note using the "New Customers" template. => Generate a discount coupon of 10% valid for a second purchase => ... Scenario 2: For Loyal Customers (order> 4) => Generate a personalized thank you note using the "Loyal Customers" template => Generate a 15% discount coupon valid for the next purchase => ... Scenario 3: For marketplace orders (marketplace containing the email) => Generate a thank you note by welcoming to your shop using the "Marketplace Customers" template. => ... Scenario 4: Christmas Season (From December 01 to December 25) => Generate a note using the "Christmas surprise gift" model. => Generate a discount coupon with a specific product. => ... + ADVANCED STATISTICS + The module offers a set of advanced reports to track your return on investment:The evaluation and inspection of sales generated from used coupon codes).Reports of scanned / converted Thanks scenarios.Or using the tab "My thanks" follow each thanks individually in order to know : If the Thanks has been scanned.If the included coupon has been used.Thanks to the statistics and observation of the clients behavior you can benefit by: → Improving your templates → Improving your scenarios to build a productive autonomous system + AN INTUITIVE AND EASY MODULE TO IMPLEMENT + "Full of features but quick and easy to adopt: Our research with a committee of about twenty merchants, permits that the module offers a clear and pleasant to user interface, with a short learning curve. " Be guided by Emma's short video tutorials to quickly get going. + WE SUPPORT AND LISTEN + "Because your time is precious and we want your full satisfaction!" In 2019 Source "addons.prestashop.com": Number of tickets received: 209 Quality of the answers: 3/3 Average time: 6.3h Positive ratings attributed to our modules: 317 Overall quality of our after-sales service: 100%

module.name: webapi

module.description: Create a fully functional mobile app for your eCommerce store to serve mobile users with a better shopping experience with PrestaShop mobile app builder PrestaMobApp. Full Andriod and IOS Support
module.author: FME Modules
module.description_full: Create a fully functional mobile app for your eCommerce store to serve mobile users with a better shopping experience with PrestaShop mobile app builder PrestaMobApp. Full Andriod and IOS Support.
module.additional_description: The PrestaMobApp is your go-to PrestaShop Mobile App Builder for building Android and iOS mobile application of your online store without coding. Building an app from scratch requires a lot of time, resources and technical knowledge but with our PrestaShop mobile App Builder, you can have your own customized app in no time at all.Our PrestaShop mobile app builder is developed to save the merchants from the hassle of creating a mobile application to double their profits with mobile commerce. Doing business on the website alone means you are losing a lot from the mobile commerce market. Expand your business to mobiles and smart gadgets with an easy to use application builder. Note:The demo app is also available on the android play store. You can search by name "PrestaMobApp", download and install to see it in action.  Code Free Mobile Application Development Our PrestaShop Mobile app builder helps you develop a complete mobile application without writing even a line of code. Easy admin panel and personalization It is quite easy to use and modify the admin panel of your mobile application for better usability. Ask for limitless customization You can ask us or any customization, our team of developers will be there to satisfy your needs(may require extra charges). Customize to your needsOur PrestaShop Mobile app builder offers endless possibilities of customizing the mobile application of your eCommerce website. You can originate another copy of your online store as a mobile version. Increase User Interaction Online buyers find it more comfortable to browse and shop for products in a secure mobile application. Having an application means gaining their trust and engaging them in your online presence. Decrease Unfinished Purchases One of the core reasons you might be facing cart abandonment is the absence of a mobile application. The users may find your website in a mobile browser but would like to switch to the desktop version for checkout. In the process, they may change their decision and leave with unfinished purchases. Build a brand with AppA brand shows concern about its loyal and potential customers with a dedicated app for browsing new products, deals, and secure payments. Build your brand fast with a mobile app using our PrestaShop Mobile app builder.
